definition[0]: if an animal mauls someone, it injures them badly by tearing their flesh
example[0]: A mentally ill man was mauled after climbing into the lions’ enclosure at London Zoo.
definition[1]: to strongly criticize something, especially a new book, play etc
example[1]: Her latest book was absolutely mauled by the critics.
definition[2]: to touch someone in a rough sexual way which they think is unpleasant
example[2]: What makes you think you’ve got the right to maul me like that?
definition[3]: to defeat someone very easily – used especially in sports reports
example[3]: Stanford have looked quite good lately. They absolutely mauled Notre Dame last weekend.
